application.doc: Set distributed session cache location to external

method.name: PUT
method.id: Set distributed session cache location to external
method.doc: Configure the location of the Distributed Session Cache (DSC). To use a DSC located on the same server, or as part of a cluster configuration, select "Local". If you wish to share data with a DSC located on another server/container, select "External" and add the connection details in an ordered list.
To complete this operation with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP PUT command on the override configs URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
